original_text: The Jews in the crowd pushed Alexander to the front, and they shouted instructions to him. He motioned for silence in order to make a defense before the people.
korean_text: 유대인들이 무리 가운데서 알렉산더를 권하여 앞으로 밀어내니 알렉산더가 손짓하며 백성에게 변명하려 하나

sentences.original_text: The Jews in the crowd pushed Alexander
sentences.korean_translation: 무리에 있던 유대인들은 알렉산더를 앞으로 밀었다

sentences.original_text: and they shouted instructions to him
in order to make a defense
